Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLTabView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECTabView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLTabView
public class SLTabView
extends ECTabView
ECTabView subclass that applies the stone-texture look using SLTabItems. This tab view can be used with lowered or raised content areas, based on the selectionStyle attribute.
See Also:
SLTabItem

LOWERED_SELECTION
mySelectionStyle
RAISED_SELECTION

getSelectionStyle()
Returns the selection style for this SLTabView, which is one of SLTabView.LOWERED_SELECTION or SLTabView.RAISED_SELECTION.

Constructs an SLTabView object with the given bounds

getSelectionStyle 
  public int getSelectionStyle()
Returns the selection style for this SLTabView, which is one of SLTabView.LOWERED_SELECTION or SLTabView.RAISED_SELECTION. LOWERED_SELECTION is the style to use when the content area has a lowered SLBezelBorder. RAISED_SELECTION is the style to use when the content area has a raised SLBezelBorder.
setSelectionStyle 
  public void setSelectionStyle(int newStyle)
Sets the selection style for this SLTabView. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the style is not one of the styles defined in this class.
See Also:
getSelectionStyle
